revision.text: Possibly: A Summary View of Heraldry in reference to the Usages of Chivalry and the general economy of the Feudal System with an Appendix respecting such Distinctions of Rank as have place in The British Constitution. By Thomas Brydson, F.A.S. Edin. (Edinburgh : Printed by Mundell & Son R. Bank Close; London: Sold by Messrs. Nicol Egerton, Edwards, Faulder, Hookham & Carpenter and Vernor & Hood, 1795). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2427744~S1
